item.description: Education Paris-Saclay University - Ecole Normale Supérieure de Paris-Saclay (2020 – 2021) Msc. in Mathematics, Vision & Learning (known as MVA) Paris-Saclay University - CentraleSupélec Graduate School (2017 - 2021) Engineering Degree in Applied Mathematics And Data Science Lycée d’Excellence MPSI-MP (2015 - 2017) Intensive Undergraduate Courses in Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Science Research and Industry Experience Mila - Québec AI Institute Montréal (May 2021 - Ongoing) Visiting Student supervised by Professors Yoshua Bengio & Loubna Benabbou

Awarded a 3 year merit scolarship from “OCP Foundation” for pursuing studies at CentraleSupélec (2017) Ranked 11 out of 3000 moroccan students at the National Entrance Exams to the Moroccan Grandes Ecoles (CNC) (2017) Awarded a 2 year scolarship from the “Mohamed VI Foundation” for getting outsanding results at the baccalaureate exam (2015) Awarded a 8 year scolarship from the “Académie Hassan II” for securing the first place at the National Physics Exam (2015) Placed first at the National Physics Exam among the top 300 moroccan students (2015) Placed second at the National Physics Olympiad among the top 20 moroccan finalists (2015)

Under Review Boussif, O., Assouline, D., Benabbou, L., Bengio, Y.(2022): MAgNet: Mesh-Agnostic Neural PDE Solver. Preprints Liu, D., Shah, V., Boussif, O., Meo, C., Goyal, A., Shu, T., Mozer, M., Heess, N., Bengio, Y.(2022): Coordinating Policies Among Multiple Agents via an Intelligent Communication Channel. arXiv: 2205.10607.
